message.body: Well this is my first convo, so not sure what to do
Hi. We just chat. I'm busy for the next hour, but just text normally
Gotcha, well I'm stuck in a car with two kids who think they're auditioning for the wwf... So just let me know when ur free!
Haaaa!
Hope you made it home in one piece!
It was definitely an eventful ride; kids prevent my life from becoming dull!!
How old are they?
My son is six and his friend is seven
Awwww. That's a cute age! I don't have any kids yet, but have spent many an hour babysitting that age
He is my only one and honestly, since we got out of age 3 it really has gotten exponentially more interesting.
He's reading now and building his interests and personality. So cool... And a ton of work, lol
Ha! That Thomas the Tank Engine phase is quite tedious!
Indeed!
That's so nice! I grew up with all girls, not sure I would even know how to raise a boy!
He's into all the superheroes now
Ah! Which one is his fave?
Instinct kicks in no matter what; that's my opinion anyway
Spider-Man definitely
I sure hope so! I can barely relate to boys my age!!! Hahaha
Oh yeah! Always a crowd pleaser!
Lol, well I still can't relate to boys and I'm a married lady.
But when it comes to ur kid, as long as the activity is delivered with love, they are happy!
Speaking of, got to get this kiddo to sleep...
Ha! Well that's good news for me!!! No rush yet for kids, but I'm ready and excited
Have a calm night!
It will be... He is out cold :-)
Have a good nite too :-)
Hello! How is your weds going?
